query.statement:
SELECT A.OCNT_NUMB ,A.PSPID ,A.ORDR_TYPE ,B.CODE_NAME AS ORDR_TYPE_NAME ,A.BSTNK ,C.ORDR_NUMB ,C.POST1 ,C.ORIT_NAME ,C.WRIT_DATE FROM SAPHEE.ZFST0304 A JOIN SAPHEE.ZFST0400 C ON ( A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.OCNT_NUMB = C.OCNT_NUMB ) LEFT JOIN SAPHEE.ZFST0100 B ON ( A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND B.CODE_GROP='A03' AND A.ORDR_TYPE = B.CODE ) WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.OCNT_STAT = '250'
AND TO_NUMBER( C.WRIT_DATE ) >= TO_NUMBER( #WRIT_STDT# )
AND TO_NUMBER( C.WRIT_DATE ) <= TO_NUMBER( #WRIT_EDDT# )
AND A.PSPID LIKE #PSPID# || '%'
AND A.BSTNK LIKE '%' || #BSTNK# || '%'
AND C.POST1 LIKE '%' || #POST1# || '%'
AND C.ORIT_NAME LIKE '%' || #ORIT_NAME# || '%'
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
